nodes.text: Meserian was a planet on the Outer Rim.

In 19 BBY, it was used as a hiding place by Jedi Master Djinn Altis and his group shortly after the formation of the Galactic Empire. Former Jedi Bardan Jusik and former Republic commando Fi Skirata went there and met with Altis to discuss their intent of transferring refugee Jedi into Altis's group.
